languages.text: Верующие Фолстоуна исполнены фанатичного рвения. Вера велит им истребить в своих рядах недолюдей, мутантов и маловерных, а затем отправиться на другие миры протектората и предать их священным чисткам. Простор Коронус полон творений богохульных ксеносов, следов ересей и книг, полных опасного знания — пусть же скверна пылает в кострах!

traits.locale_text: Устроить на планете истребление абхуманов, мутантов, маловерных. Книги — жечь, ксенотех — ломать! А затем во все концы торговой империи полетят суровые фанатики, которые испытают, достаточно ли набожны прочие миры!

languages.text: On Foulstone, the faithful are brimming with fanatical zeal. Their faith commands them to exterminate the subhumans, the mutants, and the weak of faith in their midst; then they must travel to other worlds of the protectorate to continue the holy cleansing. Creations of the blasphemous xenos, traces of heresies, and tomes of dangerous knowledge abound in the Koronus Expanse. Let the bonfires' flames consume the corruption!
languages.original_text: Верующие Фолстоуна исполнены фанатичного рвения. Вера велит им истребить в своих рядах недолюдей, мутантов и маловерных, а затем отправиться на другие миры протектората и предать их священным чисткам. Простор Коронус полон творений богохульных ксеносов, следов ересей и книг, полных опасного знания — пусть же скверна пылает в кострах!

traits.locale_text: On Foulstone, the faithful are brimming with fanatical zeal. Their faith commands them to exterminate the subhumans, the mutants, and the weak of faith in their midst, and then travel to other worlds of the trade empire to continue the holy cleansing. Creations of the blasphemous xenos, traces of heresies, and tomes of dangerous knowledge abound in the Koronus Expanse. Let the flames of bonfires consume the corruption!

Their faith commands them to exterminate the subhumans, the mutants, and the weak of faith in their midst; then they must travel to other worlds of the protectorate to continue the holy cleansing. Creations of the blasphemous xenos, traces of heresies, and tomes of dangerous knowledge abound in the Koronus Expanse. Let the bonfires' flames consume the corruption!

languages.text: En Rocainmunda, los fieles destacan por su fervor y fanatismo. Su fe les exige que exterminen a los subhumanos, a los mutantes y a los débiles de fe que hay entre ellos. Después, deben viajar a otros mundos del protectorado para seguir con esta sagrada purga. Las creaciones de los blasfemos xenos, los rastros de herejía y los volúmenes de conocimientos peligrosos abundan en la Extensión de Koronus. ¡Que las llamas de la justicia consuman la corrupción!
languages.original_text: On Foulstone, the faithful are brimming with fanatical zeal. Their faith commands them to exterminate the subhumans, the mutants, and the weak of faith in their midst; then they must travel to other worlds of the protectorate to continue the holy cleansing. Creations of the blasphemous xenos, traces of heresies, and tomes of dangerous knowledge abound in the Koronus Expanse. Let the bonfires' flames consume the corruption!

traits.locale_text: En Rocainmunda, los fieles destacan por su fervor y fanatismo. Su fe les exige que exterminen a los subhumanos, a los mutantes y a los débiles de fe que hay entre ellos. Después, deben viajar a otros mundos del protectorado para seguir con esta sagrada purga. Las creaciones de los blasfemos xenos, los rastros de herejía y los volúmenes de conocimientos peligrosos abundan en la Extensión de Koronus. ¡Que las llamas de la justicia consuman la corrupción!

languages.text: Sur Rochepeste, les fidèles sont animés d'un zèle fiévreux. Leur foi les exhorte à exterminer les sous-hommes, les mutants et les mauvais croyants en leur sein, après quoi ils sont appelés à se rendre sur d'autres planètes du protectorat pour les expurger à leur tour. Les créations iconoclastes des xénos, l'hérésie et les ouvrages impies sont légion dans les Étendues de Koronus. Que périsse la corruption dans les flammes des bûchers !
languages.original_text: On Foulstone, the faithful are brimming with fanatical zeal. Their faith commands them to exterminate the subhumans, the mutants, and the weak of faith in their midst; then they must travel to other worlds of the protectorate to continue the holy cleansing. Creations of the blasphemous xenos, traces of heresies, and tomes of dangerous knowledge abound in the Koronus Expanse. Let the bonfires' flames consume the corruption!

traits.locale_text: Sur Rochepeste, les fidèles sont animés d'un zèle fiévreux. Leur foi les exhorte à exterminer les sous-hommes, les mutants et les mauvais croyants en leur sein, après quoi ils sont appelés à se rendre sur d'autres planètes du protectorat pour les expurger à leur tour. Les créations iconoclastes des xénos, l'hérésie et les ouvrages impies sont légion dans les Étendues de Koronus. Que périsse la corruption dans les flammes des bûchers !

languages.text: 荒寂岩地上的信徒狂热不减。在炽烈的信仰中，他们消灭了人群之中的亚人类、变种人，然后清洗了信仰不够坚定的同胞。紧接着，他们必须前往王朝的其他世界，继续这场神圣的清洗。邪恶亵渎的异形造物、异端分子的旁门左道，还有在科罗努斯扩区宣扬危险知识的众多邪典都将受到正义的清洗！让熊熊烈焰烧尽一切腐化！
languages.original_text: On Foulstone, the faithful are brimming with fanatical zeal. Their faith commands them to exterminate the subhumans, the mutants, and the weak of faith in their midst; then they must travel to other worlds of the protectorate to continue the holy cleansing. Creations of the blasphemous xenos, traces of heresies, and tomes of dangerous knowledge abound in the Koronus Expanse. Let the bonfires' flames consume the corruption!

traits.locale_text: 荒寂岩地上的信徒狂热不减。在炽烈的信仰中，他们消灭了人群之中的亚人类、变种人，然后清洗了信仰不够坚定的同胞。紧接着，他们必须前往王朝的其他世界，继续这场神圣的清洗。邪恶亵渎的异形造物、异端分子的旁门左道，还有在科罗努斯扩区宣扬危险知识的众多邪典都将受到正义的清洗！让熊熊烈焰烧尽一切腐化！

languages.text: ファウルストーンでは、信者たちは狂信的な熱意に満ちている。彼らの信仰は、自分たちの中にいる亜人、変異体、信仰弱き者を絶滅させることを至上命題としており、それが成されたあとは聖なる浄化を続けるために保護領の他の惑星へ旅立たなければならないとされている。コロヌス・エクスパンスには神を冒涜するゼノの創造物、異端の痕跡、危険な知識の書物があふれている篝火の炎が腐敗を焼き尽くそう！
languages.original_text: On Foulstone, the faithful are brimming with fanatical zeal. Their faith commands them to exterminate the subhumans, the mutants, and the weak of faith in their midst; then they must travel to other worlds of the protectorate to continue the holy cleansing. Creations of the blasphemous xenos, traces of heresies, and tomes of dangerous knowledge abound in the Koronus Expanse. Let the bonfires' flames consume the corruption!

traits.locale_text: ファウルストーンでは、信者たちは狂信的な熱意に満ちている。彼らの信仰は、自分たちの中にいる亜人、変異体、信仰弱き者を絶滅させることを至上命題としており、それが成されたあとは聖なる浄化を続けるために保護領の他の惑星へ旅立たなければならないとされている。コロヌス・エクスパンスには神を冒涜するゼノの創造物、異端の痕跡、危険な知識の書物があふれている篝火の炎が腐敗を焼き尽くそう！

languages.text: Die Gläubigen auf Foulstone sind voller fanatischem Eifer. Ihr Glaube befiehlt ihnen, die Untermenschen auszulöschen, die Mutanten und die Glaubensschwachen in ihrer Mitte. Dann müssen sie auf andere Welten des Protektorats reisen, um die heilige Säuberung dort fortzusetzen. In der Koronus-Ausdehnung gibt es unzählige Schöpfungen der blasphemistischen Xenos, Spuren von Ketzereien und Bücher voller gefährlichem Wissen. Lasst die Flammen die Verderbnis verschlingen!
languages.original_text: On Foulstone, the faithful are brimming with fanatical zeal. Their faith commands them to exterminate the subhumans, the mutants, and the weak of faith in their midst; then they must travel to other worlds of the protectorate to continue the holy cleansing. Creations of the blasphemous xenos, traces of heresies, and tomes of dangerous knowledge abound in the Koronus Expanse. Let the bonfires' flames consume the corruption!

languages.text: Menfurtaş'ın inananları, dinî bir coşkuyla yanıp tutuşmakta. İnsanlıktan nasibini almamışları, mutantları ve aralarında imanı zayıf olanları yok etmeyi emreden inançları sebebiyle protektoradaki diğer dünyalara giderek kutsal tasfiyelerini sürdürmeleri gerekir. Günahkâr zenoların elinden çıkan mahluklar, kâfirlik izleri ve tehlikeli bilgiler içeren kitaplar, Koronus Enginliği'nin her yanına saçılmış hâlde. Bu yozluğu ancak ateş temizler!
languages.original_text: On Foulstone, the faithful are brimming with fanatical zeal.
